transactionbodycustomfield.description: Created 11/2022 by MDIMKOV in connection with the 3PL integrations for Returns, this checkbox is used to exclude a Return Authorization from the [OGL 44 Create IR from RMA] saved search; when Celigo flow [OGL 44 OGL => NetSuite RMA Item Receipts] runs, the UE fired [akt_3pl_rmatoir.js] sets this checkbox, so the Return Authorization doesn't appear again in the search for more information please contact mdimkov@travizer.com
transactionbodycustomfield.help: Created 11/2022 by MDIMKOV in connection with the 3PL integrations for Returns, this checkbox is used to exclude a Return Authorization from the [OGL 44 Create IR from RMA] saved search; when Celigo flow [OGL 44 OGL => NetSuite RMA Item Receipts] runs, the UE fired [akt_3pl_rmatoir.js] sets this checkbox, so the Return Authorization doesn't appear again in the search for more information please contact mdimkov@travizer.com
transactionbodycustomfield.label: Return Auth Complete
